## Return of experience regarding <span class="highlight">Innovation management ISO 56000 series</span>: Implementation in a large organization

 
Dr. Casanove is Director of Culture Evolution & intrapreneurship in Airbus North America.
She is in charge of innovation competencies and learning, developing an innovation culture and deploying the relevant tools and methods to accelerate future businesses. 

<!-- She plays a pivoting role in the publication of the ISO referential on good practices in innovation management (ISO 56000 series). -->
<!-- Indeed since 2013, she is the ISO chair of the international standardisation committee on Innovation Management (ISO 50500 series) gathering 50+ countries in close coordination with WTO, OECD, WIPO and World Bank. -->

She is an Associated Researcher at the ERPI Lab
